header.line2: notes taking application to organize your life better

features.description: Beyojar has a number of features that makes it an awesome app to keep track of your notes

0.title: Open source
0.description: Absolute transparency in how the application works and encourages collaboration to continuously improve the application

1.title: Simple
1.description: A simple and familiar user interface to get you going in no time. The user interface has been designed with minimalism in mind

2.title: Reliable
2.description: Tested for robustness to ensure that the the application is fault tolerant and fully reliably

3.title: Privacy
3.description: Data will not be shared with other services and the note related data will be persisted locally to ensure that your data fully secure

4.title: Light & Dark Themes
4.description: Support for for light and dark themes based on your preference. You can either let the app pick the default theme or override it within the settings

5.title: Keep your notes organized
5.description: Assign labels and colors in order to organize your notes better. Mark important notes so that you will never miss them out
